unnormalised: Skill assessments are becoming increasingly crucial in our recruitment process, especially for roles at the Bangalore R&D center. We've observed a 15% increase in candidate quality after implementing them. While conducting them, we need to ensure fairness across candidates, respecting diverse backgrounds. During the Onam festival season, we observed logistical challenges scheduling tests. Perhaps offering online proctoring options, especially for candidates from remote locations like R., is an option. The cost per assessment shouldn't exceed Rs. 500.
